name: Chat
tagline: Php + Javascript chat for Php-fusions. Uses Ajax or WebSocket
body:
###About Jugolo chat
This chat is a chat i am developing for my own personal happiness. There for you can download the chat for free.

You can change all what you want. But if you will publish you change please add a comments about its was the jugolo chat you have used.

In the bottom of this page you will se a change log for the chat 
 
```
###Changelog 

Version 0.0.4
News 
plugin - now it's possible to add features to the chat whit out change the main code
Plugin store - connect to my database for get available plugin maket of other people 

Change 
Change the code to work whit the newest version of php-fusion 
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
